Netshape¶

Quickstart¶

netshape is a versatile tool designed to build interactive, browser-based, and deployable visualizations of networks. This enables a more collaborative and more informative visualization process.

With netshape, a network edgelist is turned into a web-ready interactive visualization with just one command:

> netshape build AwesomeNetwork.csv
> cd dist
> netshape server
> echo "let the visualization begin"

Netshape is also highly configurable and hackable; it supports custom commands, which enables the development of complex visualization pipelines.

Dependencies¶

Before installing, ensure that python is installed on your computer.

Installation¶

Once the dependencies have been installed, in order to install netshape, simply run:

> git clone https://github.com/m-smith/netshape
> cd netshape
> make install
